text:
Making a Traditional Caipiroska Grab a fresh lime. Slice off both ends. Cut the lime in half.  Remove the bitters (the white part in the middle of the lime).  Turn  lime over and cut the wedges.  Slice the wedge horizontally into equal thirds.You should end up with 8 pieces of lime.  Add sugar and lime to rocks glass. Add 2 teaspoons of raw sugar and the 8 lime pieces. Muddle lime and sugar. Using a muddler, crush the limes with the sugar until most of the juice and pulp is released. Add ice. Pack the glass with ice. Add the vodka. Use a jigger and pour 1.5 ounces of vodka over the ice. Shake, shake, shake. Transfer the ingredients into a mixing shaker. Fit a rock glass face down into the mouth of the shaker. Now, shake the cocktail vigorously while slowly counting to ten. Serve with a lemon wedge in the drink. Saúde! ! Making a Flavored Caipiroska Start with the traditional caipiroska recipe.  Before transferring the ingredients to the shaker, add 3oz of your favorite fruit juice or puree. Mango
Strawberry
Passion Fruit
Coconut Try a different type of Vodka. Use citrus vodka. Using a citrus flavored vodka it enhance the flavor of the limes.
